text:
In this series, we are
going to demystify AI.

We'll show you how we got
here, how Generative AI works,
and explore some of the ways

that it will transform
business and society.
You don't need to become AI experts,
but everyone should have a foundation

from which to make informed
decisions about where, when,
and how we apply this new technology.

AI is going to touch
every aspect of our lives.

but how it will change
the world is up to us,
